subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Hayhurst is out of baseball for now, but his new book about his life in the minors and the majors is on The New York Times’ best-seller list for nonfiction paperbacks.
snippet: Dirk Hayhurst is out of baseball for now, but his new book about his life in the minors and the majors is on The New York Times’ best-seller list for nonfiction paperbacks.
